alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Union; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 2:54PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Flagler, central Bradford, northeastern Alachua, southeastern St. Johns, Putnam, south central Union and southwestern Clay Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 254 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Sampson to near Ormond-By-the-Sea. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Palm Coast, Palatka, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Crescent City, Interlachen, Keystone Heights, Pomona Park and Hastings. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Union; Western Clay; Western Putnam
